name: 13 Seconds (itch)
description:
How far can you reach in the never ending maze for 13 seconds?

Tap the correct button in the Directional Pad (DPad) for you to advance. Advancing is not an easy task because the DPad gets randomized every time you advance. The quicker your reflexes, more points you'll generate.
  • Free
  • No annoying advertisements
  • No social media integration
